heading: Tuesday Night
text: Clear skies; patchy valley fog; patchy frost.
temperature: Mainly mid 30 to around 40, around 30 in northern cold hollows

heading: Wednesday
text: Patchy fog early, then most sunny.
temperature: Valley highs mainly upper 50s to mid 60s, some mid 50s north

heading: Thursday
text: Any valley fog burning off to sunshine.

heading: Friday
text: Patchy fog early, mainly east, then mostly sunny.
